name: Cooking Venture: Kitchen story
description:
Welcome to Highly exciting & attractive Cooking Game adventure, where you will take the role of the trained chef will bake, cook & grill delicious meals with fast paced kitchen action on different american restaurants. Enjoy intuitively designed fast cooking action-based gameplay, take orders with best cooking strategy from numerous customers and provide the best experience using restaurant simulation and steed food recipes. Move around the kitchen based play mode & cook your way to success as a professional chef with amazing kitchen simulation by serving them your favorite food cuisines creations.

Enjoy fast paced tap cooking challenges, by expertly serving tasty meals made with steed food recipes, delicious food items using restaurant simulation. Plan out your best cooking strategy to accomplish each cooking challenge. Dispense the dishes with your new fast cooking recipes using fast paced to build your perfect cuisine. So let the adventure begins!

Best Chosen Classic Restaurant Recipes:

- Fast Food
- Pretzels
- Hot Dog
- Burgers
- Coffee & Drinks
- Sweet Corn & Fruits

Features :

-Accomplish tasks & achievements to get rewards .
-Amazing HD 3D Graphics & cooking animations.
- Explore numerous dishes with recipes to provide exceptional gaming experience.
-Unlock numerous levels with special challenging mission.
-Bake, Cook & Grill with simplified tap & play mechanism with best restaurant cuisine.
-Engaging & powerful cooking Boosts.
